page.title: 08EDUCATION IN WARGRAVE
page.content:
{Wargrave Piggott CofE Infant School 128 children aged 5 to 7+ Headmistress {Wargrave Piggott CofE Junior School 157 children aged 7+ to 11, Headmaster {Crazies Hill CofE Primary School} 49 children aged 5 to 11+, Headmaster {The Piggott School CofE Comprehensive 805 children aged 11-18, 48 staff+Head
The separate Infant and Junior schools enrol children mainly from Wargrave. The school in Crazies Hill caters for a wider area but includes some Wargrave children. The Piggott School enrols children from Twyford as well as Wargrave and some other villages.
The schools are staffed by qualified teachers who meet parents in thriving {Parent/Teacher Associations}to discuss educational affairs and to raise money for the repective schools.
